short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask Grok about any X post.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ask Grok Chrome extension seamlessly integrates Grok AI into X (formerly Twitter), allowing you to ask Grok questions about any tweet. It adds a native-looking Grok button to every tweet's action bar, providing a smooth and intuitive way to interact with Grok.
